item.title: RT by @Re_TROS: Catch a new Saturday Alternative from 3-6! Brand new music from @lomatheband, @PeterOrenMusic, @Rhyemusic, @grahamcoxon, @lizaannemusic and more. In the Fitting Room, we'll try on three tracks from @Re_TROS' new album "Before The Applause."
item.dc:creator: @WTMD
item.description: Catch a new Saturday Alternative from 3-6! Brand new music from @lomatheband, @PeterOrenMusic, @Rhyemusic, @grahamcoxon, @lizaannemusic and more. In the Fitting Room, we'll try on three tracks from @Re_TROS' new album "Before The Applause."

item.title: "Re-TROS hop from one genre to the next, always with the devotion to do each of their influences justice" - @theQuietus have ranked 'Before The Applause' number 34 in their albums of the year list! http://thequietus.com/articles/23660-albums-of-the-year-2017
